Provide private service and input providers with training and seed financing. Foster the development of new services where gaps exist. Provide financing options for new and innovative models for service delivery.
P2.P7. When available, use OIE PVS Reports, including Legislation and GAP Analysis, to assess the need for training and financing. P7. Put emphasis on developing markets for sustainable inputs, such as sustainably sourced feed, organic fertilizers, and organic pesticides.
